name: B. Easter Eggs
statement:
The Easter Rabbit laid eggs in a circle and is about to paint them. Each
egg should be painted one color out of 7: red, orange, yellow, green,
blue, indigo or violet. Also, the following conditions should be
satisfied: Each of the seven colors should be used to paint at least one
egg. Any four eggs should be painted different colors. Help the Easter
Rabbit paint the eggs in the required manner. We know that it is always
possible.
